intro.html:
A curated selection of Software Development projects that reflects my growth as a developer and QA specialist, showing my commitment to quality, continuous learning and discipline.

Each project marks an important step in my journey, from early software testing work to building applications using COBOL, Mainframe, Java, C, C++, PHP, C#, ASP Net Core and Python.

Here you will find a portfolio that includes academic work, personal projects and technical exercises that strengthen my skills in:

  • Backend development
  • Databases
  • Test automation
  • Web development

"Every line of code is a chance to learn, improve and build something that matters."
